name: Definitive
description: Definitive is an onchain trading platform democratizing advanced trading tools for the masses. Trade any token on any chain with advanced trade order types including Market, Limit Buy/Sell, Stop Loss and TWAP orders. Route your trade instantly across 100+ DEXs and liquidity pools to get the best prices on every trade. Definitive is built by former Coinbase Institutional trading alumni and active DeFi experts.
